text: The Cabbage Soup is a 1981 French science fiction comedy movie directed by Jean Girault and was based on a novel by René Fallet. It stars Louis de Funès, Jean Carmet, Jacques Villeret, Christine Dejoux and Claude Gensac. == Other websites == * * Category:1981 science fiction movies Category:1981 comedy movies Category:French science fiction movies Category:French comedy movies Category:Movies based on books
title: The Cabbage Soup
